title: Bug 18268 - Not Finding Images and Files in NL-Specific Subdirectories
description: In build 200205291235, when starting Eclipse and performing certain actions as described below, the software is not finding images and files in NL-specific subdirectories. This issue relates to the handling of the '$nl$' path segment in IPluginDescriptor.find.
OB: Upon performing the steps, it was observed that the main image is not displayed in the about dialog.
EB: When opening the about dialog, the expected behavior is that the main image should be displayed. However, in this case, it is not being found as expected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Exit Eclipse.
2. Copy the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif> into an NL-specific subdirectory; i.e., move it to <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/nl/en/eclipselg.gif>.
3. Start Eclipse.
